DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize , multicenter , open-label phase III clinical trial compare efficacy safety Bortezomib combination Rituximab , high-dose Ara-C dexamethasone ( R-HAD ) R-HAD alone patient relapse refractory MCL eligible myeloablative treatment . The primary endpoint time treatment failure ( TTF ) . Secondary endpoint complete response ( CR ) rate , overall response ( CR , PR ) rate , progression-free survival ( PFS ) , progression free survival responder , time next lymphoma treatment , overall survival ( OS ) , safety tolerability Rituximab , high-dose Ara-C dexamethasone alone combination Bortezomib . Study arm compare evaluate impact additional Bortezomib . Study arm also compare historical control .
